measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(CLAIM_ID) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) FROM CLAIMS
description: Claim ID should be present in 99%+ of records

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(PATIENT_FIRST_NAME) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) FROM CLAIMS
description: Patient first name must be 100% complete

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(PROVIDER_NPI) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) FROM CLAIMS
description: Provider NPI should be present in 95%+ of records

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE PATIENT_DOB BETWEEN '1900-01-01' AND CURRENT_DATE()
description: Patient DOB should be in valid range

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS WHERE PROVIDER_NPI IS NOT NULL)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE LENGTH(PROVIDER_NPI) = 10
description: NPI should be 10 digits

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE BILLED_AMOUNT > 0
description: Billed amounts should be positive

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS WHERE ALLOWED_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE ALLOWED_AMOUNT <= BILLED_AMOUNT
description: Allowed amount should not exceed billed amount

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS WHERE PLAN_PAID_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE PLAN_PAID_AMOUNT <= ALLOWED_AMOUNT
description: Plan paid should not exceed allowed amount

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS WHERE PROCESSED_DATE IS NOT NULL)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE SERVICE_DATE <= PROCESSED_DATE
description: Service date should be before or equal to processed date

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT CLAIM_ID) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) FROM CLAIMS
description: Claim IDs should be unique

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT NPI) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) FROM PROVIDER_DIRECTORY
description: Provider NPIs should be unique in directory

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS WHERE PROCESSED_DATE IS NOT NULL)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE DATEDIFF('day' SERVICE_DATE PROCESSED_DATE) <= 30
description: Claims should be processed within 30 days

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS WHERE PLAN_TYPE IS NOT NULL)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE PLAN_TYPE IN ('PPO' 'HMO' 'EPO' 'POS' 'Indemnity' 'Medicare Advantage' 'Medicaid')
description: Plan types should be from valid list

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS WHERE CLAIM_TYPE IS NOT NULL)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE CLAIM_TYPE IN ('MEDICAL' 'DENTAL' 'PHARMACY' 'VISION')
description: Claim types should be valid

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE BILLED_AMOUNT BETWEEN 0.01 AND 100000
description: Claim amounts should be reasonable (under $100k)

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE DATEDIFF('year' PATIENT_DOB CURRENT_DATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 120
description: Patient age should be reasonable (0-120 years)

measurement_query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 100.0 ELSE 0.0 END FROM CLAIMS WHERE SERVICE_DATE >= DATEADD('day' -90 CURRENT_DATE())
description: Should have claims from last 90 days

measurement_query: SELECT ((COUNT(*) - COUNT(DISTINCT CLAIM_ID)) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) FROM CLAIMS
description: Duplicate claim rate should be under 2%

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE PATIENT_FIRST_NAME IS NULL
description: Null rate for patient name should be under 1%

measurement_query: SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIMS)) FROM CLAIMS WHERE BILLED_AMOUNT > (SELECT AVG(BILLED_AMOUNT) + (3 * STDDEV(BILLED_AMOUNT)) FROM CLAIMS)
description: High-value outliers should be under 5%
